meanings.sent1: The old books in the basement were mildewing from the dampness.
meanings.sent2: Leaving wet clothes in a pile can lead to them mildewing.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten sandwich in the fridge was mildewing, creating a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting to clean the shower can result in the tiles mildewing over time.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house had a musty smell, with furniture mildewing in the corners.

meanings.definition: To cover or become covered with mildew.
meanings.sent1: The damp towel was mildewing on the bathroom floor.
meanings.sent2: If you leave food out for too long, it may start mildewing.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten loaf of bread was mildewing, turning green in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The neglected garden bench was mildewing, blending into the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The damp walls of the cellar were mildewing, creating a musty odor.
